title: Thresh
body:
Now Flays and Hooks people over the wall, like he can push/pull people through a wall and bring them to his side.

Is this a bug or was it always possible and I never knew?

e.g. I hooked the enemy jungler when we were doing dragon so he would be cc'd and not be able to jump in the pit and I dragged him through the wall into the pit -_-
At another point I flayed someone to CC them so Zed could finish them off and it pushed them over the wall.

replies.body: Pretty sure its always been possible on the thin walls
^this. been possible since thresh has been out. however the enemy has to be hugging the wall for it to actually work
Is a bugg shouldn't even be able to flay things through a wall let alone hook wtf
